about_the_game:
Features

Time for new adventure:
Gather your party and develop relationships with your companions. Blast your opponents in deep, tactical, turn-based combat. Use the different combination of cards to seal your victory.

* Deck Building: Choose your cards wisely! Discover hundreds of cards to add to your deck. Every character have unique style of deck.
* Freedom the Explore: Go anywhere, talk to anyone and interect with them. Kill any npc. Take risks to get stronger or choose a more peaceful way.
* Create your team: Take npcs for your team. Choose them for your need and become stronger.

short_description: We fused card games and open-world rpg together to make the best single player open world deckbuilder we could. Build your party with different races, craft a unique deck, encounter bizarre creatures, complete the quests and get ready for a breathtaking adventure
